description: Fetches AWS CloudWatch and forwards to syslog server with spoofed source IP using Scapy.
Fetches AWS CloudWatch logs and forwards to syslog server.
Pulls Google Workspace audit logs and sends to FortiSIEM-compatible syslog server.
Fetches privileged access management events from Iraje API and forwards to SIEM with deduplication.
Collects Netskope alert, application, and audit events and sends to syslog server.
Extracts Office 365 activity audit logs via MSAL authentication and sends to syslog server.
Fetches RediffmailPro email logs from last 15 minutes and forwards to syslog with optional spoofing.
Collects SentinelOne activities, threats, and cloud-detection alerts and sends to syslog.
Fetches TechOwlShield security alerts and forwards to syslog with spoofed source IP using Scapy.
Retrieves Trend Vision One XDR API events and forwards to syslog with source IP spoofing.
Pulls WatchGuard Endpoint Detection and Response security events from all endpoints to syslog.
Exports Zoho Mail logs to syslog with optional UDP source IP spoofing using Scapy.
Pull Logs from your sophos central and send to syslog server
Pull logs from CATO SASE and sent to syslog server
